clusterList.phrase: the evidence generally shows that the decriminalization of possession is not clearly associated with any increase in illicit drug use
those who consume alcohol cannabis cocaine or ecstasy under the age of 16 are likely to have had sexual relations before this age too

the current patterns of drug use among the study participants reflect their number of sexual partners with regular cocaine users in comparison with those who have never taken it being five times more likely to have had five or more sexual partners within the last 12 months or to have paid for sex

prevention experts must be aware of how young people view the relationship between drug use and sexuality there are very few preventive programmes in our country that take this link into consideration

now that we are aware of this link and the associated health risks new programmes and preventive strategies will be needed in addition to further research in the area of drug use and its social psychological and physical links to sexuality based on the real and important experiences of young people themselves
the age of initiation to alcohol has come down from 19 years in 1986 to 13 5 years in 2006
